metadata.title: CVE-2022-4254 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
sssd: libsss_certmap fails to sanitise certificate data used in LDAPfilters

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-4254` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libipa-hbac0 - 2.2.3-3ubuntu0.11
libnss-sss - 2.2.3-3ubuntu0.11
